questions.question_text: Which two View graphics technologies are hardware accelerated? (Choose two.)
What is the last step that must be completed to prepare a desktop virtual machine for use in a linked clone pool?

choices.D: Shut down the virtual machine and then take a snapshot
choices.B: Turn on the virtual machine and then take a snapshot
choices.A: Install VMTools on the virtual machine
choices.C: Install the Horizon View Agent on the virtual machine

discussion.content: D- Shut down virtual Machine and take a snapshot should be the last step when preparing a master machine for a instant-Clone pool.
correct answer should be D Shutdown and take snapshot
Correct answer D -Shutdown and take snapsshot
aGREE shut down the mahcine and take a snapshot
Sames goes for a Parent Machine when preparing a Linked-Clone Pool

questions.question_text: How can an administrator lock down access to the User Environment Manager management console?

choices.D: By disabling access to the User Environment, Personalization, Condition Set, and Application Migration ribbons
choices.A: By disabling the Configure ribbon button
choices.C: By locking access to the VMware UEM Management Console ADMX template
choices.B: By using the Lock down access to VMware UEM Management Console policy setting

questions.question_text:
A Microsoft Windows Server Operating System master image is being developed for use as a single-session host.
Which two steps must the administrator perform before installing VMware Horizon Agent? (Choose two.)

choices.A: Install the Remote Desktop Services Role
choices.C: Install Service Pack 1 for Windows Server 2008 R2 or Windows Server 2012 R2
choices.B: Verify that the Remote Desktop Services role is not installed

discussion.content:
Here is the accurate explanation: https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Horizon-7/7.13/horizon-virtual-desktops/GUID-5D941C48-C931-4CA5-BA23-8AA0C392A6DE.html

Procedure
1.- Verify the the Remote Desktop Services role is not installed.
When the Remote Desktop Services role is not present, the Horizon Agent installer prompts you to install Horizon Agent in RDS mode or desktop mode. If the Remote Desktop Services role is present, the Horizon Agent installer does not display these options and it treats the Windows Server machine as an RDS host instead of a single-session Horizon 7 desktop.
2.- During Horizon Agent installation, select Desktop mode to install Horizon Agent as a single-user virtual desktop where published desktop features will not be available.
3.- Install Windows Server 2008 R2 Service Pack 1 (SP1).
If you do not install SP1 with Windows Server 2008 R2, an error occurs when you install Horizon Agent. ...

A- VMXNET3
C-PVSCSI

VMXNET3 must be always the first choose, if you donâ€™t have any good reason not to do it. Paravirtual driver from next generation with lot of features and low hypervisor overhead

https://thevirtualist.org/vdi-optimization-vm-hardware/

E1000e was recommended in middle of ESXi6.7 because the vmxnet virtual driver was goofed, but that's been fixed for a while now.
A&C

Correct Answer is A and C

 https://techzone.vmware.com/creating-optimized-windows-image-vmware-horizon-virtual-desktop#1150978
Please change answer to A & C
